channel.title: Webclient Error [After Jarring & Signing]
channel.description: Allright so i made all the things to make the webclient, It downloads and runs the cache and all that 100%. Ive noticed the client runs from a jar named "Theme.Jar". So when i Jar the client and all it Jars and Signs 100% fine. When I run the Jar it loads a lil but then gives me that black error page with yellow text. My Manifest is "Client" btw.

item.title: Webclient Error [After Jarring & Signing]
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

Allright so i made all the things to make the webclient, It downloads and runs the cache and all that 100%. Ive noticed the client runs from a jar named “Theme.Jar”. So when i Jar the client and all it Jars and Signs 100% fine. When I run the Jar it loads a lil but then gives me that black error page with yellow text.
My Manifest is “Client” btw.

Read full topic
